January 5, 1959
AIR HAIL
Mr* Marshall MeLuhan, Chairman
Culture & Coinmunfccatiana Seminar
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 10, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Received your note and additions today {Saturday)* Will
try to work on this this week-end, since more trips are in
the offing*
Ifd greatly appreciate a copy of The Mechanical Bride*
Also—I*m not spre, from the listings sent ae. which of
your articles pciassrooa Without Walls” etc.) fare in which
issues of Sbylorations listed (particularly not clear about
6, 7, and FJ* tfan "you clarify, please?
It would also be useful is we had extra copies of a .few of
your articles which we could attach, and extras of Explor¬
ations 3, as available.
Sincerely,
Hany 1. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJS/dp
